name: Duck Life (itch) (nICOLEdev)
description:
Be a duck, Quack, jump and crouch around the park!
Unlock achievements and more in this wacky 2d small adventure!
Inspired by Untitled Goose game.
Download available!
( The pet achievement may not be working fully as intented!)

Controls: 
W A S D or Arrow keys to move, Space to jump
S or down arrow to crouch
Enter to interact
